```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
activities_clean <- read_csv(here("clean_data/activities_clean.csv"))
```


What kind of tourism activity generates the highest income for Scotland?
```{r}
highest_income <- activities_clean %>% 
  filter(breakdown_of_domestic_tourism == "Expenditure") %>% 
  group_by(tourism_activity) %>% 
  summarise(million_pounds = sum(value)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(million_pounds))
highest_income
```
 
 
```{r}
highest_income %>% 
  filter(tourism_activity != "All") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = tourism_activity, y = million_pounds) +
  geom_col() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))
```
